history.proof: qsimpl time: 1. qsimpl time: 1 use: Rminus_eq_0. qsimpl time: 1 use: Rminus_eq_0,Rlt_trans. qsimpl time: 1 use: Rminus_eq_0,Rlt_trans,Rabs_R0. qsimpl time: 1 use: Rminus_eq_0,Rlt_trans,Rabs_R0. qsimpl time: 1 use: Rminus_eq_0,Rlt_trans,Rabs_R0.

exceptions.exn: In environment T, U : UniformSpace x : T -> Prop y : T -> U c : forall x0 : T, x x0 -> continuous y x0 eps : T The term "eps" has type "UniformSpace.sort T" while it is expected to have type "R".
The LHS of Rminus_eq_0 (_ - _) does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment H0 : forall r : R, r - r = 0 T, U : UniformSpace x : T -> Prop y : T -> U c : forall x0 : T, x x0 -> continuous y x0 eps : T H : x eps The term "eps" has type "let (sort, _, _) := T in sort" while it is expected to have type "R".
The LHS of Rabs_R0 (Rabs 0) does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment H4 : Rabs 0 = 0 H3 : forall r1 r2 r3 : R, r1 < r2 -> r2 < r3 -> r1 < r3 H0 : forall r : R, r - r = 0 T, U : UniformSpace x : T -> Prop y : T -> U c : forall x0 : T, x x0 -> continuous y x0 eps : T H : x eps Unable to unify "UniformSpace.sort T" with "filterlim y (within x (locally eps)) (locally (y eps))".

In environment H5 : Rabs 0 = 0 H2 : forall r1 r2 r3 : R, r1 < r2 -> r2 < r3 -> r1 < r3 H1 : forall r : R, r - r = 0 T, U : UniformSpace x : T -> Prop y : T -> U c : forall x0 : T, x x0 -> continuous y x0 eps : T H : x eps Unable to unify "UniformSpace.sort T" with "filterlim y (within x (locally eps)) (locally (y eps))".

original: intros x y c. unfold continuity_2d_pt. intros eps. unfold locally_2d. exists (eps/2). intros u v H1 H2. simpl. rewrite Rminus_eq_0. apply Rlt_trans with (r2:= eps). - rewrite Rabs_R0. apply eps. - apply eps.
